summary: The module supplies command‑line utilities that set up and execute NeMo's ClusteringDiarizer for offline speaker diarization on audio files, with an optional pipeline that also runs automatic speech recognition and logs the combined results.
business_intent: To give developers and analysts a ready‑to‑use solution for extracting speaker segments—and optionally transcriptions—from recorded audio, supporting use cases such as meeting summarization, call‑center analytics, and media indexing.
